title: (Gameplay) Dunkmaster Darius' hidden taunts not working?
body: So it came to my understanding that darius has several hidden interactions involving the store and many of the other champions. He also has his standard taunts and jokes, but whenever I use his taunt in the proximity of an enemy champ that I know he has a specialized taunt for, he just says his standard phrase instead, for instance, "Nocturne spooky". I am not sure if this is intentional or a bug, but it bothers me that a feature of his legendary skin isn't working properly. Any help would be very appreciated. :)

replies.body:
Hiya HeavensReaper, 

I was able to trigger the taunt against en enemy Nocturne by using /taunt. He'll say "I don't get nightmares, Nocturne, but you are putting me to sleep", as well as "Nocturne...spooky", like you had mentioned.
I see, could it be something with my client? (I play on a mac)
**Update:** Have you tried repairing your client to see if for some reason the audio got jumbled? We're not seeing issues with a mac specifically.
Weirder things have happened. Lemme see if I can grab someone with a Mac to test it out.
